2.title: The White Room
2.plot: Waking up in a white room among her classmates Amber discovers that she has been simulated into a virtual reality video game. Vincent, the girls' bus driver and culprit, has configured the game to allow him to simulate any person he wants in order to control them. Amber refuses to be used for the satisfaction of anyone, including this stranger which leaves her in a dire situation. This White Room is the girl's virtual prison and it is up to Amber to jailbreak their way to freedom.

imdb.plot outline: ARTIFAMILY specializes in creating android clones of deceased loved ones so that no one must suffer the loss of losing someone too soon ever again. Their team of scientists were able to upload and digitize brain cells to construct an exact clone, using machine learning and patented algorithms to generate a personality match from the digital data. Apart from a small microchip behind the left earlobe, you would never know that ARTIFAMILY members weren't human. Suffering from PTSD and stricken with grief Robert turns to ARTIFAMILY and receives a perfect replica of his daughter Jessica. Every aspect and feature of her is mesmerizing; the attention to detail from her voice to her personality is spot on. It is almost as if the real Jessica is standing before him. However Robert is to quickly discover that there is something about this Jessica - that just isn't the same.
imdb.title: Future Darkly: ArtiFamily

Suffering from PTSD and stricken with grief Robert turns to ARTIFAMILY and receives a perfect replica of his daughter Jessica. Every aspect and feature of her is mesmerizing; the attention to detail from her voice to her personality is spot on. It is almost as if the real Jessica is standing before him.
